resources.string: SELECT match_player1, match_player2, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games WHERE game_match = match_id AND game_set = 1 AND game_winner = 1) AS s11 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games WHERE game_match = match_id AND game_set = 2 AND game_winner = 1) AS s21 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games WHERE game_match = match_id AND game_set = 3 AND game_winner = 1) AS s31 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games WHERE game_match = match_id AND game_set = 1 AND game_winner = 2) AS s12 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games WHERE game_match = match_id AND game_set = 2 AND game_winner = 2) AS s22 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games WHERE game_match = match_id AND game_set = 3 AND game_winner = 2) AS s32 FROM match ORDER BY match_id
